bufferView.description: The id (JSON property name) of the bufferView to reference for index data.

byteOffset.description: The offset relative to the bufferView in bytes. Similar to drawElements indices (ES) / offset (WebGL) parameter.

count.description: The number of indices referenced, not to be confused with the number of bytes.  The drawElements count parameter.

type.description: drawElements() type parameter.  Corresponding typed array: Uint16Array.
